bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names huo yan dan zhong 火焰丹腫 , flaming cinnabar swelling. Pathological Condition of dan du 丹毒 , cinnabar red poison, starting from the head and generating a dark red complexion. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry zhi zi 梔子 quoting Hai shi fang 梅師方 from ZLBC: 治火丹毒，搗和水調傅之 , “To cure flaming cinnabar poison, pound and apply externally mixed with water”. writes : 火焰丹毒：梔子搗和水塗之 , “For flaming cinnabar poison , pound zhi zi , add water and apply it externally”.
